definitions.title: du.
definitions.body: [[אָפְסָָים]] not ´[[א]]; v. Baer), lit. the two extremities, i.e. either the soles of the feet (so AW Ges; cf. Aram. [[פִּיסְּתָא]], pasto0, or the ankles (so SyrVer Targum Vulgate, & most): only Ez Eze 47:2 ´[[מֵי א]] water of (i.e. reaching to) the soles (or ankles); cf. v:Eze 47:4 [[מֵי]] [[מָתְנָָיִם]] water reaching to the loins.
